00038 #define THROW_TE(_code_, _str_) do { ThriftGen::ClientException te; \
00039   te.code = _code_; te.message = _str_; \
00040   te.__isset.code = te.__isset.message = true; \
00041   throw te; \
00042 } while (0)
00043 
00044 #define THROW_(_code_) do { \
00045   Hypertable::Exception e(_code_, __LINE__, HT_FUNC, __FILE__); \
00046   std::ostringstream oss; oss << e; \
00047   HT_ERROR_OUT << oss.str() << HT_END; \
00048   THROW_TE(_code_, oss.str()); \
00049 } while (0)
00050 
00051 #define RETHROW() catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) { \
00052   std::ostringstream oss;  oss << HT_FUNC <<": "<< e; \
00053   HT_ERROR_OUT << oss.str() << HT_END; \
00054   THROW_TE(e.code(), oss.str()); \
00055 }
00056 
00057 #define LOG_API(_expr_) do { \
00058   if (m_log_api) \
00059     std::cout << hires_ts <<" API "<< __func__ <<": "<< _expr_ << std::endl; \
00060 } while (0)
00061 
00062 #define LOG_HQL_RESULT(_res_) do { \
00063   if (m_log_api) \
00064     cout << hires_ts <<" API "<< __func__ <<": result: "; \
00065   if (Logger::logger->isDebugEnabled()) \
00066     cout << _res_; \
00067   else { \
00068     if (_res_.__isset.results) \
00069       cout <<" results.size=" << _res_.results.size(); \
00070     if (_res_.__isset.cells) \
00071       cout <<" cells.size=" << _res_.cells.size(); \
00072     if (_res_.__isset.scanner) \
00073       cout <<" scanner="<< _res_.scanner; \
00074     if (_res_.__isset.mutator) \
00075       cout <<" mutator="<< _res_.mutator; \
00076   } \
00077 } while(0)

00099 void
00100 convert_scan_spec(const ThriftGen::ScanSpec &tss, Hypertable::ScanSpec &hss) {
00101   if (tss.__isset.row_limit)
00102     hss.row_limit = tss.row_limit;
00103 
00104   if (tss.__isset.revs)
00105     hss.max_versions = tss.revs;
00106 
00107   if (tss.__isset.start_time)
00108     hss.time_interval.first = tss.start_time;
00109 
00110   if (tss.__isset.end_time)
00111     hss.time_interval.second = tss.end_time;
00112 
00113   if (tss.__isset.return_deletes)
00114     hss.return_deletes = tss.return_deletes;
00115 
00116   // shallow copy
00117   foreach(const ThriftGen::RowInterval &ri, tss.row_intervals)
00118     hss.row_intervals.push_back(Hypertable::RowInterval(ri.start_row.c_str(),
00119         ri.start_inclusive, ri.end_row.c_str(), ri.end_inclusive));
00120 
00121   foreach(const ThriftGen::CellInterval &ci, tss.cell_intervals)
00122     hss.cell_intervals.push_back(Hypertable::CellInterval(
00123         ci.start_row.c_str(), ci.start_column.c_str(), ci.start_inclusive,
00124         ci.end_row.c_str(), ci.end_column.c_str(), ci.end_inclusive));
00125 
00126   foreach(const std::string &col, tss.columns)
00127     hss.columns.push_back(col.c_str());
00128 }
00129 
00130 void convert_cell(const ThriftGen::Cell &tcell, Hypertable::Cell &hcell) {
00131   // shallow copy
00132   if (tcell.__isset.row_key)
00133     hcell.row_key = tcell.row_key.c_str();
00134 
00135   if (tcell.__isset.column_family)
00136     hcell.column_family = tcell.column_family.c_str();
00137 
00138   if (tcell.__isset.column_qualifier)
00139     hcell.column_qualifier = tcell.column_qualifier.c_str();
00140 
00141   if (tcell.__isset.timestamp)
00142     hcell.timestamp = tcell.timestamp;
00143 
00144   if (tcell.__isset.revision)
00145     hcell.revision = tcell.revision;
00146 
00147   if (tcell.__isset.value) {
00148     hcell.value = (uint8_t *)tcell.value.c_str();
00149     hcell.value_len = tcell.value.length();
00150   }
00151   if (tcell.__isset.flag)
00152     hcell.flag = tcell.flag;
00153 }
00154 
00155 void convert_cell(const Hypertable::Cell &hcell, ThriftGen::Cell &tcell) {
00156   tcell.row_key = hcell.row_key;
00157   tcell.column_family = hcell.column_family;
00158 
00159   if (hcell.column_qualifier && *hcell.column_qualifier) {
00160     tcell.column_qualifier = hcell.column_qualifier;
00161     tcell.__isset.column_qualifier = true;
00162   }
00163   else
00164     tcell.__isset.column_qualifier = false;
00165 
00166   tcell.timestamp = hcell.timestamp;
00167   tcell.revision = hcell.revision;
00168 
00169   if (hcell.value && hcell.value_len) {
00170     tcell.value = std::string((char *)hcell.value, hcell.value_len);
00171     tcell.__isset.value = true;
00172   }
00173   else
00174     tcell.__isset.value = false;
00175 
00176   tcell.flag = hcell.flag;
00177   tcell.__isset.row_key = tcell.__isset.column_family = tcell.__isset.timestamp
00178       = tcell.__isset.revision = tcell.__isset.flag = true;
00179 }
00180 
00181 void convert_cells(const ThriftCells &tcells, Hypertable::Cells &hcells) {
00182   // shallow copy
00183   foreach(const ThriftGen::Cell &tcell, tcells) {
00184     Hypertable::Cell hcell;
00185     convert_cell(tcell, hcell);
00186     hcells.push_back(hcell);
00187   }
00188 }
00189 
00190 int64_t
00191 cell_str_to_num(const std::string &from, const char *label,
00192                 int64_t min_num = INT64_MIN, int64_t max_num = INT64_MAX) {
00193   char *endp;
00194 
00195   int64_t value = strtoll(from.data(), &endp, 0);
00196 
00197   if (endp - from.data() != (int)from.size()
00198       || value < min_num || value > max_num)
00199     HT_THROWF(Error::BAD_KEY, "Error converting %s to %s", from.c_str(), label);
00200 
00201   return value;
00202 }
00203 
00204 void convert_cell(const CellAsArray &tcell, Hypertable::Cell &hcell) {
00205   int len = tcell.size();
00206 
00207   switch (len) {
00208   case 7: hcell.flag = cell_str_to_num(tcell[6], "cell flag", 0, 255);
00209   case 6: hcell.revision = cell_str_to_num(tcell[5], "revision");
00210   case 5: hcell.timestamp = cell_str_to_num(tcell[4], "timestamp");
00211   case 4: hcell.value = (uint8_t *)tcell[3].c_str();
00212           hcell.value_len = tcell[3].length();
00213   case 3: hcell.column_qualifier = tcell[2].c_str();
00214   case 2: hcell.column_family = tcell[1].c_str();
00215   case 1: hcell.row_key = tcell[0].c_str();
00216     break;
00217   default:
00218     HT_THROWF(Error::BAD_KEY, "CellAsArray: bad size: %d", len);
00219   }
00220 }
00221 
00222 void convert_cell(const Hypertable::Cell &hcell, CellAsArray &tcell) {
00223   tcell.resize(5);
00224   tcell[0] = hcell.row_key;
00225   tcell[1] = hcell.column_family;
00226   tcell[2] = hcell.column_qualifier ? hcell.column_qualifier : "";
00227   tcell[3] = std::string((char *)hcell.value, hcell.value_len);
00228   tcell[4] = format("%llu", (Llu)hcell.timestamp);
00229 }

00231 void
00232 convert_cells(const ThriftCellsAsArrays &tcells, Hypertable::Cells &hcells) {
00233   // shallow copy
00234   foreach(const CellAsArray &tcell, tcells) {
00235     Hypertable::Cell hcell;
00236     convert_cell(tcell, hcell);
00237     hcells.push_back(hcell);
00238   }
00239 }

00243 template <class ResultT, class CellT>
00244 struct HqlCallback : HqlInterpreter::Callback {
00245   typedef HqlInterpreter::Callback Parent;
00246 
00247   ResultT &result;
00248   ServerHandler &handler;
00249   bool flush, buffered;
00250 
00251   HqlCallback(ResultT &r, ServerHandler *handler, bool flush, bool buffered)
00252     : result(r), handler(*handler), flush(flush), buffered(buffered) { }
00253 
00254   virtual void on_return(const String &);
00255   virtual void on_scan(TableScanner &);
00256   virtual void on_finish(TableMutator *);
00257 };

00259 class ServerHandler : public HqlServiceIf {
00260 public:
00261   ServerHandler() {
00262     m_log_api = Config::get_bool("ThriftBroker.API.Logging");
00263     m_next_limit = Config::get_i32("ThriftBroker.NextLimit");
00264     m_client = new Hypertable::Client();

00267   virtual void
00268   hql_exec(HqlResult& result, const String &hql, bool noflush,
00269            bool unbuffered) {
00270     LOG_API("hql="<< hql <<" noflush="<< noflush <<" unbuffered="<< unbuffered);
00271 
00272     try {
00273       HqlCallback<HqlResult, ThriftGen::Cell>
00274           cb(result, this, !noflush, !unbuffered);
00275       get_hql_interp().execute(hql, cb);
00276       LOG_HQL_RESULT(result);
00277     } RETHROW()
00278   }

00280   virtual void
00281   hql_query(HqlResult& result, const String &hql) {
00282     hql_exec(result, hql, false, false);
00283   }

00397   virtual void
00398   get_cell(Value &result, const String &table, const String &row,
00399            const String &column) {
00400     LOG_API("table="<< table <<" row="<< row <<" column="<< column);
00401 
00402     try {
00403       TablePtr t = m_client->open_table(table);
00404       Hypertable::ScanSpec ss;
00405 
00406       ss.cell_intervals.push_back(Hypertable::CellInterval(row.c_str(),
00407           column.c_str(), true, row.c_str(), column.c_str(), true));
00408       ss.max_versions = 1;
00409 
00410       Hypertable::Cell cell;
00411       TableScannerPtr scanner = t->create_scanner(ss, 0, true);
00412 
00413       if (scanner->next(cell))
00414         result = String((char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00415 
00416       LOG_API("table="<< table <<" result="<< result);
00417     } RETHROW()
00418   }
00419

00444   virtual Mutator open_mutator(const String &table, int32_t flags,
00445                                int32_t flush_interval) {
00446     LOG_API("table="<< table);
00447 
00448     try {
00449       TablePtr t = m_client->open_table(table);
00450       Mutator id =  get_mutator_id(t->create_mutator(0, flags, flush_interval));
00451       LOG_API("table="<< table <<" mutator="<< id);
00452       return id;
00453     } RETHROW()
00454   }

00456   virtual void flush_mutator(const Mutator mutator) {
00457     LOG_API("mutator="<< mutator);
00458 
00459     try {
00460       get_mutator(mutator)->flush();

00465   virtual void close_mutator(const Mutator mutator, const bool flush) {
00466     LOG_API("mutator="<< mutator <<" flush="<< flush);
00467 
00468     try {
00469       if (flush)
00470         flush_mutator(mutator);
00471 
00472       remove_mutator(mutator);
00473       LOG_API("mutator="<< mutator <<" done");
00474     } RETHROW()
00475   }

00555   // helper methods
00556 
00557   TableScannerPtr
00558   _open_scanner(const String &name, const ThriftGen::ScanSpec &ss,
00559                 bool retry_table_not_found) {
00560     TablePtr t = m_client->open_table(name);
00561     Hypertable::ScanSpec hss;
00562     convert_scan_spec(ss, hss);
00563     return t->create_scanner(hss, 0, retry_table_not_found);
00564   }
00565 
00566   template <class CellT>
00567   void _next(vector<CellT> &result, TableScannerPtr &scanner, int limit) {
00568     Hypertable::Cell cell;
00569 
00570     for (int i = 0; i < limit; ++i) {
00571       if (scanner->next(cell)) {
00572         CellT tcell;
00573         convert_cell(cell, tcell);
00574         result.push_back(tcell);
00575       }
00576       else
00577         break;
00578     }
00579   }
00580 
00581   template <class CellT>
00582   void _next_row(vector<CellT> &result, TableScannerPtr &scanner) {
00583     Hypertable::Cell cell;
00584     std::string prev_row;
00585 
00586     while (scanner->next(cell)) {
00587       if (prev_row.empty() || prev_row == cell.row_key) {
00588         CellT tcell;
00589         convert_cell(cell, tcell);
00590         result.push_back(tcell);
00591         prev_row = cell.row_key;
00592       }
00593       else
00594         break;
00595     }
00596   }
00597 
00598   template <class CellT>
00599   void _get_row(vector<CellT> &result, const String &table, const String &row) {
00600     TablePtr t = m_client->open_table(table);
00601     Hypertable::ScanSpec ss;
00602     ss.row_intervals.push_back(Hypertable::RowInterval(row.c_str(), true,
00603                                                        row.c_str(), true));
00604     ss.max_versions = 1;
00605     TableScannerPtr scanner = t->create_scanner(ss);
00606     _next(result, scanner, INT32_MAX);
00607   }
00608 
00609   HqlInterpreter &get_hql_interp() {
00610     ScopedLock lock(m_interp_mutex);
00611 
00612     if (!m_hql_interp)
00613       m_hql_interp = m_client->create_hql_interpreter();
00614 
00615     return *m_hql_interp;
00616   }
00617 
00618   template <class CellT>
00619   void _set_cells(const Mutator mutator, const vector<CellT> &cells) {
00620     Hypertable::Cells hcells;
00621     convert_cells(cells, hcells);
00622     get_mutator(mutator)->set_cells(hcells);
00623   }
00624 
00625   template <class CellT>
00626   void _set_cell(const Mutator mutator, const CellT &cell) {
00627     CellsBuilder cb;
00628     Hypertable::Cell hcell;
00629     convert_cell(cell, hcell);
00630     cb.add(hcell, false);
00631     get_mutator(mutator)->set_cells(cb.get());
00632   }
00633 
00634   int64_t get_scanner_id(TableScanner *scanner) {
00635     ScopedLock lock(m_scanner_mutex);
00636     int64_t id = (int64_t)scanner;
00637     m_scanner_map.insert(make_pair(id, scanner)); // no overwrite
00638     return id;
00639   }
00640 
00641   TableScannerPtr get_scanner(int64_t id) {
00642     ScopedLock lock(m_scanner_mutex);
00643     ScannerMap::iterator it = m_scanner_map.find(id);
00644 
00645     if (it != m_scanner_map.end())
00646       return it->second;
00647 
00648     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Bad scanner id - " << id << HT_END;
00649     THROW_TE(Error::THRIFTBROKER_BAD_SCANNER_ID, format("%lld", (Lld)id));
00650   }
00651 
00652   void remove_scanner(int64_t id) {
00653     ScopedLock lock(m_scanner_mutex);
00654     ScannerMap::iterator it = m_scanner_map.find(id);
00655 
00656     if (it != m_scanner_map.end()) {
00657       m_scanner_map.erase(it);
00658       return;
00659     }
00660 
00661     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Bad scanner id - " << id << HT_END;
00662     THROW_TE(Error::THRIFTBROKER_BAD_SCANNER_ID, format("%lld", (Lld)id));
00663   }
00664 
00665   int64_t get_mutator_id(TableMutator *mutator) {
00666     ScopedLock lock(m_mutator_mutex);
00667     int64_t id = (int64_t)mutator;
00668     m_mutator_map.insert(make_pair(id, mutator)); // no overwrite
00669     return id;
00670   }
00671 
00672   TableMutatorPtr get_mutator(int64_t id) {
00673     ScopedLock lock(m_mutator_mutex);
00674     MutatorMap::iterator it = m_mutator_map.find(id);
00675 
00676     if (it != m_mutator_map.end())
00677       return it->second;
00678 
00679     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Bad mutator id - " << id << HT_END;
00680     THROW_TE(Error::THRIFTBROKER_BAD_MUTATOR_ID, format("%lld", (Lld)id));
00681   }
00682 
00683   void remove_mutator(int64_t id) {
00684     ScopedLock lock(m_mutator_mutex);
00685     MutatorMap::iterator it = m_mutator_map.find(id);
00686 
00687     if (it != m_mutator_map.end()) {
00688       m_mutator_map.erase(it);
00689       return;
00690     }
00691 
00692     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Bad mutator id - " << id << HT_END;
00693     THROW_TE(Error::THRIFTBROKER_BAD_MUTATOR_ID, format("%lld", (Lld)id));
00694   }
00695 
00696 private:
00697   bool       m_log_api;
00698   Mutex      m_scanner_mutex;
00699   ScannerMap m_scanner_map;
00700   Mutex      m_mutator_mutex;
00701   MutatorMap m_mutator_map;
00702   int32_t    m_next_limit;
00703   ClientPtr  m_client;
00704   Mutex      m_interp_mutex;
00705   HqlInterpreterPtr m_hql_interp;
00706 };
00707 
00708 template <class ResultT, class CellT>
00709 void HqlCallback<ResultT, CellT>::on_return(const String &ret) {
00710   result.results.push_back(ret);
00711   result.__isset.results = true;
00712 }
00713 
00714 template <class ResultT, class CellT>
00715 void HqlCallback<ResultT, CellT>::on_scan(TableScanner &s) {
00716   if (buffered) {
00717     Hypertable::Cell hcell;
00718     CellT tcell;
00719 
00720     while (s.next(hcell)) {
00721       convert_cell(hcell, tcell);
00722       result.cells.push_back(tcell);
00723     }
00724     result.__isset.cells = true;
00725   }
00726   else {
00727     result.scanner = handler.get_scanner_id(&s);
00728     result.__isset.scanner = true;
00729   }
00730 }
00731 
00732 template <class ResultT, class CellT>
00733 void HqlCallback<ResultT, CellT>::on_finish(TableMutator *m) {
00734   if (flush) {
00735     Parent::on_finish(m);
00736   }
00737   else if (m) {
00738     result.mutator = handler.get_mutator_id(m);
00739     result.__isset.mutator = true;
00740   }
00741 }
00742 
00743 }} // namespace Hypertable::ThriftBroker
00744 
00745 
00746 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00747   using namespace Hypertable;
00748   using namespace ThriftBroker;
00749 
00750   try {
00751     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00752 
00753     uint16_t port = get_i16("port");
00754     shared_ptr<TProtocolFactory> protocolFactory(new TBinaryProtocolFactory());
00755     shared_ptr<ServerHandler> handler(new ServerHandler());
00756     shared_ptr<TProcessor> processor(new HqlServiceProcessor(handler));
00757     TNonblockingServer server(processor, protocolFactory, port);
00758 
00759     HT_INFO("Starting the server...");
00760     server.serve();
00761     HT_INFO("Exiting.\n");
00762   }
00763   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00764     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00765   }
00766   return 0;
00767 }
